backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles with picture storage, access control, social features like friend requests, and search functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user, room, and message data into a new structure supporting profile pictures, room members, friendships, and image messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping major features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend components, hooks, and styles used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining warm color palettes and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile setup/editing, settings, friends, room selection, and message display.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog for listing friends and inviting one to a room, with loading states and friend preview cards.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message input component allowing text and image upload with validation, previews, upload progress, and send handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays a scrollable list of messages with sender info, images, and autoâ€‘scrolling, plus an invite dialog and composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists chat rooms and allows creating new rooms, handling loading, errors, and room selection.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Dialog for viewing existing friends and searching users, with friend cards, search results, and request actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing a user profile with name, bio, avatar color, and image upload handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile setup dialog allowing users to enter name and bio and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user's avatar using a profile picture or a colored initial fallback.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings dialog for choosing theme and adjusting message polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Hooks to list chat rooms and create new rooms via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Hooks for searching users, retrieving friends, and sending or accepting friend requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Mutation hook to add a user to a room and refresh the room list.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Hooks for fetching room messages with polling and posting new messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks to load and update caller or arbitrary user profiles via an actor instance, with cache invalidation on profile save.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app in the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and versioning for a chat application.
